content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work with my father when we both witnessed a pure white light in the sky.  my first thought from a distance was it was a star or helicopter. as we approached closer, it was moving quite fast and below the cloud cover.  clearly it was not a star.  it was also flying and very erratic speeds. a few times it would disappear behind hills then reappear. changed direction from a north east location to a due north location. it moved way too fast to be a helicopter, and had no directional lights. it was just a pure white ball of light.   unfortunately, it was too dark for a photo and we were on rt. 28, so stopping was not an option.
content.summary: Very bright star like object below cloud cover

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down a rural highway. i first noticed it because it wasn't moving at all. i thought it was the top of a cell tower in the distance at first because of the bright white light. as i got closer i realized it was to high up to be a cell tower and thought maybe a plane, except it wasn't moving. that's when i told my wife riding in the passenger seat to start watching it.  

 it hovered in the same spot for 10 minutes. the closer i got i could see it better and it had very bright white lights on the bottom and two large pyramids outlined in a red light that wasn't bright like the lights on the bottom. 

 when we got into town i pulled over to watch it and thats when it took off. not fast like in the movies but slowly then it picked up speed somewhat but it didn't fly fast like a jet. it flew directly over town and off into the darkness. the towns small only 15000.

 after seeing it the first time i felt concerned and just thought that surely many others must have seen it too.

 i left the house 5 hours later at midnight and on my way back home i seen it again 30 miles away from where i first seen it. this time it was hovering over the river about a half a mile from the highway i was driving down. seeing it the second time has freaked me out majorly, i have never believed in aliens or ufos so to be honest right now i'm a bit afraid and that has lead me here.

 after seeing it the second time i called the police. they said they'd had no other reports and they wanted my name. i don't think they care. i feel alone with no one to talk to about this and i do feel strangely emotional right now, almost to tears. i'm not sure why i think because i know no one is going to believe me. the second time i seen it i was driving alone on a rural highway around midnight. 5 hours after the first sighting. 

 someone with knowledge of what i may have seen please do contact me. i'm a bit freaked out by this. this thing was what was it doing and why was it here?
content.summary: Large strangely shaped bright lights and hovering. it had a rectangular base the top was two pyramids

content.detailedDescription:
1) we were driving from halifax, ns to yarmouth, ns along highway 101 in mid april 2004.
2) the object emerged from over the treeline on the left side of the highway. 
3) an alien craft. it was enormous, round and was completely silent. 
4) all we could see were one row of red lights along the outer edge all the way around the disc. one light was like a chaser light, sort of like kitt from knight rider but it moved clockwise around the craft, not back and forth. by the time this chaser light got back around the craft the one ahead of it was only about 10% illuminated. the lights illuminated like pixels, the brightest light jumped from one light emitting fixture to the next in sequence. the craft disappeared after stopping on top of us, matching our speed of approximately 110km/h. my car did not have a sunroof so it wasn't visible for about 5 seconds. as soon as it became visible in my rear view mirror i accelerated as hard as i could, to around 180km/h and it did not pursue.
5) for some reason i wasn't scared of it. it all happened very fast and very early in the sighting it was clear that although it had changed direction in response to our presence it chose not to pursue us. however now, writing this i am very emotional...
6) the object was hovering over the highway motionless or moving very slowly. looking back the rotational movement of the red lights was less apparent, likely due to the distance between us and it. it looked more like it was pulsing / flashing red and every time it would flash its angle / position was different. left, right, left, right, etc. it eventually disappeared around a corner, it was hovering very low and was completely obstructed by trees. a few moments later we drove into an eerie fog and a squirrel appeared to be frozen on the right shoulder in mid stride, it was very strange. it wasn't dead, it had bright eyes, just as if it was frozen in time. i don't think the position it was in should have been possible, it was almost like it was leaping out onto the road and froze mid-air. i feel like our trip took much longer than it should have. we left halifax around 6:30 or 7 and we arrived in yarmouth after midnight. my girlfriend who was with me that night disagrees on this and maintains we left halifax later and that the times add up. i am positive we left at sunset. this took place within minutes of the greenwood air force base. i would love to hear from you. this was a spectacular experience and i have a witness. we have never used drugs.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large spinning disc emerged from the treelike while driving at night.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my front porch at 12 midnight when strange light in sky caught my eye. it hovered and pulsated at tree line and was silent.  i often observe the night sky and i have never noticed this type of light before. it was not a star, too close to be a star.  i do like to stargaze and am familiar with the night sky from my front porch. i have never seen anything like this before
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was definitely not a star, helicopter or airplane.

content.detailedDescription:
I was stopped at a red light about to turn onto rt. 376 in wappingers falls ny at approximately 9pm on the night of april 11th, 2012. as the light turned green and i began to enter the intersection. as i did the car that had stopped at the light that just turned red began violently beeping his horn. at first i thought i may have pulled into the intersection in front of him or something because of the way that he was laying on the horn. but as i turned to look at his car i saw the object out of the corner of my eye. i realized he was trying to alert me to it's presence. 

it was a large triangular shape with the point of the triangle pointing straight up. the object was about 50 feet higher than the trees in the area. 

the edges of the triangle were illuminated with a constant yellowish-white light. each angle of the triangle was bisected by a fainter light of the same hue. the three lines that bisected each angle connected in the center of the object where there was a red glowing light. this light was not overwhelmingly bright but it was steady. 


it was moving at a relatively slow pace along the the same direction as the road. (i was driving probably 20mph, where the speed limit is 40mph)as it is traveling it is slowly gaining altitude and speed while at the same time it began to level off and fly in way that you would imagine a triangle would fly if one could. 

since it is gaining speed on me so all that i can see is the rear of the object at this point. it is lit up and glowing white from the back, much akin to the way the  propulsion of the millennium falcon looks in star wars. there was no noise emitted from the craft what so ever. 

on 376 there is a small airport, i thought maybe that this craft was heading towards it perhaps to land there, even though it looked nothing like any aircraft i have ever seen. it did not - it continued along 376 and flew out of sight too fast for me to keep up. 

i remember all the details incredibly vividly but when i returned home i wrote down exactly what i saw in my journal so that i would never forget the details. i just found out about mufon recently, otherwise i would have submitted this information much sooner. i hope that something comes of this, or that whoever else saw this craft will step forward and confirm what i have seen.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Triangle shaped, w/edges illuminated(solid yellowish/white) each angle in triangle was bisected by a faint line that connected in the center at a red dot.

content.detailedDescription: It started when i was in the car with one of my friends, he was driving. i looked up and about 500 or so feet i saw three lights, two white lights with a red one in the middle none of them were blinking.Then one of the white lights turned off and the other one was like a transparent beam or search light that only went down about 5ft or so from the craft or whatever it was.I said wtf to myself i did not want to say anything to my friend because i did not want to seem like a nut and brushed it off if it ended there i wouldn't have thought twice about it.About two hours later while still thinking about what i saw i decided to go home.When i got back home i saw the same exact three lights two apartment buildings away from mine  about 100-150ft above the tree line it was just hovering in one spot it did not move there was an airplane in the background for reference. i got freaked out and just went inside.
content.summary: I saw two white lights with a red one in the middle none was flashing.

content.detailedDescription: While traveling home from atlanta (about 2:45am on february 6, 2014), driving on i-85n, my partner and i witnessed the bright (white) lights of what appeared to be a low-flying aircraft.  we first noticed it as we drove under jimmy carter blvd overpass in norcross, georgia, turning a slight corner in the highway. at first sighting, we both assumed it was a low-flying airplane.  because of the bright white lights (and also because it seemed to be stationary), we both assumed the aircraft was flying directly toward us.  as we approached the lights, we both noticed the strange, rectangular row of lights, commenting that it wasn't an airplane (that it was too low) and nervously joked that it was a ufo because neither of us could identify the type of craft.  as our vehicle approached the exit for indian trail-lilburn (the next exit from jimmy carter blvd), it became clear that it definitely wasn't any known aircraft because it was hovering and completely still.  the craft was hovering near a short tower right before indian trail exit, and as we passed underneath, i glanced up to see its triangular shape.  the craft was pointed north to northeast, had several white lights along the bottom side of the triangle's perimeter, including the rear side, which also had a single, red light at the rear. because i was in the left-most lane (not including the hov lane), i didn't have time to traverse the number of lanes to my right in order to take the indian trail exit (to get a better look at the craft). i had to take the beaver ruin road exit, which was 1-2 miles away.  we kept our sights on the craft via the rear and side view mirrors of the vehicle, but lost sight of it once we were too far away.  i took the beaver ruin exit, making a u-turn of sorts, and got onto 1-85 south.  we searched the skies for the craft, but by the time we had made the turn-around, the craft had already disappeared.  i'm still in disbelief as to how stereotypical the craft appeared, and a bit haunted by how close to the ground it was.  i am curious if anyone else reported seeing this same craft, and i would like to be contacted if someone reports such.
content.summary: Saw low-flying, triangular aircraft which, upon closer distance, was hovering above the highway.

content.detailedDescription: Lights would chase each other & change colors & sizes. some would blink out & some would blink on. brighter green light stayed low & stationary. some of the red lights were very bright  but would change to white or disappear. one small white light sped in from long distance to join with others. after about 10-15 minutes a jet came towards us from south & all lights immediately disappeared. jet went through exactly where lights were & turned & went back the way it came. lights did not reappear. my brother-in-law saw all this with me. there was never a sound from the lights & they were never more than 1/4 mile away.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Red & white lights 1/4 mile away randomly moving in all directions & changing colors.  one bright green light stayed low & stationary. one small white light came from far away quickly to join with others.

content.detailedDescription:
Husband told me in morning of the 5th of feb 2014. he saw it very late on feb 4th, 2014. he is a very cool guy. had it been me, i would have told him the instant he got up. in fact, i would have awakened him. he just calmly told me after he'd been up, started his coffee, sat down at his computer. he has never ever hallucinated. neither of us has ever had any experience of the mystical, immaterial, extra-physical. ever. at all. 

he's a retired english professor, perfectly rational. he often stays up very late and sleeps late in a.M. so it was not at all unusual for him to be up at that hour. he saw for about 45 minutes, as he came and went, getting ready for bed. he probably had his eyes on it for 20-25 minutes of the 45 minutes.  it was like a sort of flashing ball of many different colored lights, all different colors, he said.

 we don't have the kind of phones that take photos. and he didn't even know where to find our camera which is just an ordinary camera. we don't have any means of taking video. we are kind of low-tech. 

two issues. one. the seahawks had just won the super bowl. could it have been some kind of celebratory something? two: he looked online and i looked too. nothing. someone should have seen it also, one would think. but he did find that exactly 2 years before, feb 4th of 2012, a glowing ball like the one he saw had been sighted in ballard in seattle in exactly same sky position!!! there;s a video of it and a report online. you can look it up; he says it's very similar to what he saw. this seems very odd. 

trust me, he's not making this up.  i know him, married over 50 years. i'm a retired librarian (mls degree) and very concerned with truth, facts, knowledge. i'm not sure the ball contained all the colors i marked. he just said all colors, every color, changing.

at first husband thought it was a plane with landing lights but it just stayed in place, like hovered there. we are fairly close to seatac airport and lots of military like fort lewis. husband now says he got binoculars (i watch birds) and then saw it was not a plane for sure.

so far, my husband has only told me and my son in oakland ca.

please get back if you find any more info about this sighting!!!!
content.summary: Husband, not i, saw night of 2/4-5/2014

content.detailedDescription: While driving home around dusk we observed odd white lights hovering in the sky at a low altitude maybe 500- 1000 feet. several other drivers noticed and pulled over/slammed on their breaks, we continued driving however to try to get to a better spot. upon getting closer to the object, you could see three distinct white lights forming a triangle shape, with a faint triangular outline that blended in with the sky but you could tell there was something there. the object hovered in place for maybe a minute, and then it shot up vertically into the air at an incredible speed, ascending maybe 30,000 feet in half a second. then made an abrupt right angle northerly, and disappeared.
content.summary: Observed triangular craft, ascended a very high altitude in a split second, then made an abrupt turn

content.detailedDescription:
My best friend was in foley, al, outside smoking a cigarette and noticed the full moon just after 10 pm.  as she looked she saw a star-like shape bottom right of the moon that just appeared odd.  she kept glancing and looking as she never remembered seeing a star in that position like that.  when she had finished her cigarette the light just seemed so different and she couldn't shake the feeling that it was very unusual.  she decided to pull out her iphone and take a picture.  she said she knew how interested in the ufo phenomenon i am, so she thought i would like to see the shape she caught.  we talk on the phone every night but she had forgotten all about the incident until about 2 weeks later.  she texted me the pic and i immediately knew that was no star.
i enlarged the pic on my iphone and saw the curve/bowed shape of the lights.  i then downloaded the pic to my laptop to get a better look with a bigger pic.  i have the windows live gallery program and was able to enlarge and adjust contrast on the pic.  when i saw the shape of the object silhouetted by the light of the moon, i can't express how dumbfounded i was.  and still am.  
my impression of what i see is that the craft looks like a wwii sherman tank that's seen better days! something you would see right out of star wars parked outside the cantina. a used, beat up vehicle with a whole lot of miles on it.
i know experts say there's no way to determine size, but i think this thing looks huge. am i going overboard to wonder if all the smaller lights to the left of the craft could be smaller craft coming and going? and look at that one that looks like a porthole.
so the "star" was observed about 20 minutes in the same position while she smoked her cigarette, and then she went back inside.
content.summary: Looking at full moon and noticed strange shaped star so i took pic with phone

content.detailedDescription: I had just gone upstairs to get ready for bed and was closing my blinds when i noticed a flying object with beautiful lights that flashed, pulsated and seemed to be sequential but then changed to random in the way they blinked/flashed.  the object seemed to be a cross and had a sort of light beam that connected the points of this cross that reminded me of bridge cables.  these light beams were white but the lights that flashed like a plane were different colors.  at first, i thought it was a plane because i live close to an airport, but what made me realize it wasn't a plane, was how beautiful the lights were and that it hovered and did not move.  it slowly moved at a pace that it didn't seem like it was moving.  i ran downstairs to go outside as i thought perhaps my window was causing a reflection and that i might not be seeing this correctly.  when i went outside it was still there and had barely moved.  at times the flashing lights were just white. i kept trying to compare it to the other stars. i ran inside to get my binoculars but when i used my binoculars, it seemed a lot farther away and i could not see the colored lights?  which caused me to think, perhaps i'm just imagining things?  it also seemed to wobble a bit and then dip and go back to where it was hovering.  i even pulled out my iphone to see if it was a star/planet.  on my iphone it showed to be in the canis major constellation and seemed to be very close to sirus, which i thought perhaps it's just sirus, but stars don't move that fast in the sky.  it was very cold so, i decided to go back to my bedroom and watch it from there.  it slowly crept west but very slowly.  i thought perhaps it's a satellite, but even satellites move faster than that? i watched it for a good hour and 1/2 hoping that it might just shoot away like i've heard.  eventually, clouds started moving towards it and i was able to see it in front of the cloud and then it get behind the cloud so i couldn't see it.  it was much smaller as it was farther away.  i then tried to find something on the internet about this and i haven't yet. i've since been looking at planes and stars to see how they compare to what i saw and they don't.  this was something very different and unique.  it had to be some sort of ufo.  my feeling was that it was friendly?  but, that is just my feeling.  there are no stars, planets, or planes that have that pattern or are in that part of the sky at this time.  i tend to look up at the night sky on a very consistence basis and have never seen anything like that.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Beautiful cross with flashing lights that formed a diamond shape.

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up to use the bathroom, i then looked out the window to see if it was snowing. i looked up to the nw i then seen a cigar shaped object with what looked like green, gold and blue lights flashing faster then any plane i have ever seen. i have no idea what it was/is i do know it's not any aircraft that i know about. after i came to grips with what i was seeing, i thought it was great to be seeing this. 

  it was cigar shaped with what looked like supports holing another smaller cigar shape in front of it. the lights were in front, back and the right side[unable to see the left]. it was moving slowly to the nw at about 500 feet maybe less. i was not able to hear any noise, i did have a fan going right next to me. the craft never stopped or changed its path. i was watching it for about 2 min, till i lost sight of it. 

my feelings was, "this is great i seen a ufo" i then went and layed back down. in bed next to my girlfriend i was thinking about what i seen, knowing most of my life that "et" is out there, and that i just seen them. i made my self go to sleep. 

i lost sight due to a small window in my room and the position of the window i can not see to far to the north.
content.summary: Seen a cigar shaped object fly slow to the nw

content.detailedDescription: I was like home in my sofa and then everything became red and i became superman for 1.5 minutes. and suddenly i was a taxi driver
content.summary: Hi mom!!!

content.detailedDescription:
At the time, it just seemed like a rapid series of small events attributed to the heat, but....I know better.  and my colleagues know better.

i was painting inside my new home, an old turn-of-the-20th century model with no air conditioning and no fans.  i had one of the windows open and several unopened jugs of water, but the heat was stifling.  after a while i worried i'd get heat sickness, since i was slick with sweat (and i never sweat), so i set the brushes down and went downstairs for water.  again, i had not opened the jug previous to now, so i was surprised that the rim tasted kind of sweet.  the back of my mind whispered that something wasn't right, but i ignored it.  i didn't have hot water in the house yet at that was fine with me, i wanted the cooler (not cold, just cooler due to the heat around the pipes) water to help stand the heat.  

i was able to handle the water for about.....One minute.  my skin burned, and i found myself screaming at the pain and barely able to stand up.  my vision was blurry, and i knew i was about to pass out, so i quickly turned off the water, stumbled to my bed (that was right by the bathroom), and collapsed.

the last thing i remember before waking up, and it felt like that hazy part of a dream in those few seconds before you wake, was a man setting me down on the bed and standing behind me.  i liked him, as in i felt safe with him there.  i felt my body sink onto the bed, like i actually had just been set down, right before i opened my eyes.  over two hours had passed when i checked my phone....And it was then that i found three smallish red marks on the back of my hand.

to me, i'd just had a very minor heat stroke and a wild dream, but i felt very unsettled.  i felt terrified, actually.  i quickly called my best friend (now boyfriend) to see if he could come over immediately, which he did.  i told him the story, omitting the "dream" about the man.  he took one look at my hand and his face went grim.  we have mutual friends and colleagues involved with certain sciences, and the first theory he had was that the grays had taken me.  of course we set that aside and had an esthetician (skincare specialist) look at the back of my hand, and i was told that it could very well just be bug bites.  but she had to admit, this was very symmetrical and perfectly aligned, rather unusual for insects.  if they were bites, then the marks would be gone in a matter of days.  if the marks remained there longer, then....She was honest.  then it would mean that my chances of abduction skyrocketed, no pun intended.

the marks were there for over a month, far beyond normal insect bites.

this happened last august, and i did a very good job of shoving the incident aside.  but then a few nights ago (feb 3 at 1:30am) i had just finished a movie and shut it off when i heard a low, pulsating, mechanical noise surrounding the apartment building.  i now live near a major road/highway, so i looked outside to see if there were any semis or vehicles driving by.  there was absolutely nothing, and as i looked, something inside me screamed to get away from the windows and stay the hell inside.  i sat on my bed for a moment, trying to figure out what the hum could be...And i was beyond terrified.  i don't get scared easy, and i have seen some messed up crap in my life, and as a christian i have not only been trained in prayer battle, but i've exorcised demons and faced off with truly scary people.  but right at this moment, i was shaking, crying, and clutching my bible for dear life.  it came to a point where i found myself curled up in the bathroom shower, praying for that stupid hum to go away!  during this i kept trying to call my boyfriend, but he never answered.  i did have a friend on facebook who prayed with me, and who understood the gravity of the situation.  i blasted worship music on youtube and then pandora, and it helped dim down the hum (i could still hear it, though).  the second a song stopped to transition, though, the hum pulsated louder like a revving engine.  every now and then the window would vibrate and tapping sounds could be heard.  only once did an actual vehicle drive by, closer to 2am and a completely different sound.

for three hours i stayed awake, trying to read my bible amidst the cacophony.  deep down i'd long since realized that i'd heard this exact same hum the "night the water burned" in august.  and all i could think, all that was chanting in my mind was, "keep the lights on.  stay awake.  pray.  keep the lights on.  stay awake.  pray."

for three hours.  then at 3:45am, it stopped.  and at that exact moment, three states away, my boyfriend woke up.  he'd noted the time because he never wakes up that early on his own, and when he checked his phone he was shocked to see that not only had i called him dozens of times, but he hadn't heard any of it.  

i went the entire day completely shaken.  i didn't go to school, i didn't even leave my room unless it was to use the bathroom.  he wanted to know what had happened, but it was several hours before i could even speak, at all.  finally i told him, and the whole time i did my heart raced and my body trembled, and i prayed it wouldn't happen again.  even though he reassured me it probably won't happen again, he did confirm the whispered fear in my mind: the m.O. fit the description of the grays.  he promised to contact our colleagues to see if there is any further information to help, but as of right now, as i write this, we have heard nothing.  

he is the only one who knows the whole story.  i debated on whether to report it or not...But the activity is something that needs to be recorded, and perhaps i am not the only one in the area to experience this.  even now as i write this, there is a tapping at my second floor window that has me playing worship music just in case.
content.summary: Suspected abduction

content.detailedDescription: My neighbor was with a friend at a lake behind my property. he took some pictures on his phone and only noticed the objects in the air in his pictures later. he saw and heard nothing when he took the pictures. he sent me a picture that i am submitting that has 2 objects. these are not raindrops on the camera or birds etc, as he sent me more pictures of objects that were taken later. at his home he expanded the picture on his phone and you can clearly see the upper object is a classical disc ufo. i submitted pictures to this site that i took on my property in 2006 of an object that looks like the lower object in this new photograph. my neighbor also mentioned that some friends he knows were in that area that day and they saw 4 objects in the sky. my neighbor has also witnessed strange light phenomena behind his place, in the direction of my property. i am extremely familiar with different aircraft, as i am a retired air force aircraft technician.
content.summary: Pictures taken, objects in pictures noticed later

content.detailedDescription: I first saw the objects when i got off work,a co worker pointed them out to me. i then watched them as i drove home. upon arriving home, i stayed outside and watched them for a couple hours trying to figure out what they were. they were going around in circles,like they were chasing each other. i wish i knew what they were,because there was no sound at all,there was no beam of light from the ground,like if someone were shining spotlights on the clouds. they seemed to be near pittsburgh int'l. airport,but,having lived here all my life i know what airport traffic looks and sounds like and as i previously stated there was no sound at all. any info you have on this would be greatly appreciated. i really have no idea when the objects left,i stopped watching after about 3 hours. also,i tried to record or photograph them but none of my cameras would work.
content.summary: Watched 2 blue lights circling in the sky for about 3 hours

content.detailedDescription: Driving south on 217 saw two really bright orange yellow lights hovering over beaverton/tigard area. one light was bigger and brighter and was higher in the sky. i saw an airplane aproching the smaller light. the airplane was tiny in comparison to the smaller light. as the airplane got closer the smaller light shifted or vibrated then took off west at an amazing speed.
content.summary: Two lights hovering over city, airplane aproched smaller craft took off west amazingly fast.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the ohio river on a stretch of river just above the cardinal (aep) power plant and  below wellsburg wv. i was working as a deckhand  on the towboat elizabeth m . the pilot of the boat went to his room to catch a couple winks and i was running the boat up the river, by myself in the pilot house. it was a clear night and i was looking at the stars when i saw one just turn off . this got my attention and i continued to watch this area of the sky.This was above the hills on the wv side of the river. as i continued to watch i eventually saw a total of 5 , what looked like slightly larger than normal stars turning of and on randomly.They were in a what i could best describe as a staggered horizontal line with approximately 1/4 mile or less spacing between each of them.  within a few minutes i saw a small plane approaching the stars. i could clearly see the navigation lights on the plane. at this time all 5 stars are lit up and as the plane got closer the lights (stars) would go off . this happened one by one except when it got close to the last star. the last one just shot straight up and out of sight in the blink of an eye. 
   i was in awe of what i had just witnessed and really wished there had been someone else there with to witness it . 
   i dont know what it was and had never seen anything like that before or after until i saw a video of the ufo over the dome of the rock.  when that one shoots straight up , it is exactly what i saw that night , when that last star just shot straight up.
   this was many years ago when i was a young man, so my memory of the exact dates and times elude me now. the event lasted for 5-10 minutes and was probably in the fall of 1978 between midnight and 4 am but the event is still clear in my mind .
content.summary: 5 lights in staggered line going of and on small plane approaches lights go off one by one as it nears them last one shoots up and out of sight

content.detailedDescription: My sister was driving me to an appointment in williamsport,pa. when she said look at that jet...Its going so slow...I looked and saw what i thought was a big passenger jet but then realized it had no wings... it was as long as a 747 and the same diameter in the center...With a hump at each end like the 747 has..I realized as we got closer they it was only a few hundred ft. off the ground and was stationary. it was just north of i-80 and just east of i-180 a few hundred ft. we were very close and could see it was smooth.. no seams..White or very shine chrome color with what looked like a dark black window or door in the middle. i was so busy trying to figure out what it wasn't that by the time i went to get my cell for a pic it was gone. i don't know if it took off or disappeared.. just gone and no traces of it anywhere. im very observant and really didn't believe what i saw at first. but i know it wasn't a plane..Blimp..Cloud..Or anything i've ever seen in the sky..Or the ground for that matter! afterwards i was very upset about not getting a pic but can see now why many wouldn't. a friend later in the day described the exact same thing to me that she had seen an hour later in the selinsgrove,pa. are area bout ten miles or more south of where sis and i saw it.  that's about it i guess... thanx...Ed moyer
content.summary: Saw a large cylinder shape hovering near the highway then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Me and my team were outside monitoring the monitors.We were investigating a house for paranormal activity.We were looking up watching satellites fly across the sky.We looked to the north and noticed an object coming that was bright white real high up then we saw one coming from the west.They actually met and looked like they hit each other,but it was like they became one object.I had a green laser and i hit the object with the laser and a blue light shinned back. then it shot straight up and was gone. right after that two helicopters flew over and i was in the military and i know for a fact a stealth flew over my house tree line level, i know it sounds weird but we all saw the same thing.
content.summary: There were two.One came from th north then the other came from the west.Then they hit each other it looked like and became one object.Then it went up and was gone.

content.detailedDescription: At around 6:30 pm -7:30 pm i can not remember the actual time but it only lasted for a few minutes. me and my dad were walking the dogs when i turned around to say something and i saw in the sky that there were at first 5 of these orbs moving across the sky they we a amber color almost like embers from a fire and what looked almost like they made a formation and made the points of a pentagon and then quickly faded away and then two more of these objects and faded away in the same place as the other objects
content.summary: The color was a amber and looked like embers from a fire and looked fuzzy

content.detailedDescription:
This report is being filed by field investigator david kreiter for the witness. 
  a marion, iowa witness and his father were watching the persiod meteor showers late at night in august of 2013.  the father was the first to notice an object that was blocking out star light in the northern sky at about 25 degrees above the horizon. they both watched as the object, which was being pursued by two military jets employing after-burners, moved toward the ese. the object and the jets eventually disappeared from view in the ese. about 10 to 15 minutes later the object with the jets still in perusit reappeared from the ese but at a slightly lower altitude. the unidentified object and the two jets eventually disappeared from view in the ne.
content.summary: A dark oval-sphaped object that blocked out star light

content.detailedDescription: This was told to me by my mother many years ago and i asked her to re-tell me recently so i could document it. i have always been fascinated by ufo's. this happened when i was 3 years old in 1974 in a very rural area in mississippi. we now live about 30 minutes from there. at the time we lived on a gravel road in the country near my grandparents. like i said, i was 3, my brother was 4 and my sister a newborn. it was around 6oclock in the evening in march. from the kitchen window you could see across the dirt road into a field that had no trees. my mother went to the kitchen sink to warm a bottle for my sister. she glanced out the window and seen a huge object hovering in the field. she said it never touched the ground but set silently hovering for about 20 minutes. she said it was pulsating a pinkish light all over. she kept saying that is was huge and it was nothing like she had ever seen. she went out onto the porch to get a better look at it. me and my brother followed her and she sent my brother next door to get my grandparents. they came over and stood on the porch with my mother watching this thing. it never moved other that pulsating this light. there were no windows that my mother or grandparents could see. she said that the object was bigger than a plane and never made any noise. she said they stood there just staring at it trying to figure out what it was. finally, my mother said she had to feed my baby sister and my grandparents went home and we went in the house. she picked up my sister and went back to the kitchen window and it was gone, all in about 2 minutes that it took to get my sister picked up. she said nothing else ever happened and there was no missing time. she was to afraid to go across the road and look around.
content.summary: Hovering object seen in field

content.detailedDescription:
I was lying in bed. it was around 12:20 a.M. i was about to fall asleep when i noticed a bright orb (which i initially thought was a star) standing in the middle of the night sky. i watched it for a few minutes. after 4-5 minutes, the orb suddenly moved. it shifted downward at incredible speed, moving down and then left and then right. it did this for several minutes. 

the movements it made could not be done by any man-made aircraft. that's how i knew it was a ufo. i watched the orb for a good 25-30 minutes in the night sky. around 10 minutes after i first spotted it (and after it made a bunch of shifting movements), it hovered again in the night sky.

the orb seemed to be moving around in a limited amount of area in the night sky, as it hovered over the neighbourhood adjacent to my neighbourhood. from my personal estimate, i think the orb was at an altitude of somewhere between 3,000 - 5,000 feet over the bloor and fieldgate area.

the orb would continue to shift direction and move incredibly fast from left to right to right to left as well as up and down and down to up. in a sense, it acted like a pinball moving from one spot of the night sky to another.

about 15-20 minutes after my first sighting, that's when i noticed a second craft. this second craft appeared almost triangular shape and pitch-black in colour. however, the rear of this craft had 5-6 lights on it, and they flashed in a sequential sequence. i remember seeing 2-3 orange lights flashing simultaneously on the back of this craft, before 2-3 red lights did the same. the craft moved east over my neighbourhood, with its lights switching from red to orange every 2-3 seconds. 

this craft was at a much lower altitude than the orb and moving slower than it. it was moving at the same speed an aircraft or helicopter would make, so it may in fact have been an airplane, but from the odd shape of it and the mysterious light formation on the back of the aircraft, i don't believe it was a man-made aircraft.

while the second craft was moving across the night sky over my neighbourhood, the white orb appeared stationary for a few seconds before it quickly shifted its position again to the right. when the second craft was out of my view, the orb continued to shift quickly to the right and move higher in the night sky. by this time, it was around 12:40 a.M. i took one last look at the orb and noticed it was now just hovering again in the night sky. it did not move for a few minutes. 

because i had been up for almost 16 hours, i was quite exhausted and fell asleep. i do not know what happened to the orb or the second craft, but from my experience seeing these 2 crafts in the night sky, i personally think these were ufos. 

i have not seen them since my first sighting.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Small white orb hovered over night sky before making constant turns and shifts in altitude

content.detailedDescription: My fiance and i were getting into bed in our second story bedroom. we both noticed bright lights out of our window. we both got up to look out our window. when we pulled the shade down, we noticed that the lights were so bright that it illuminated the whole front yard. when we looked up, we noticed the triangular shape. it was so low the i could see underneath the object. the object was bigger than my house. the object was completely silent. the object was flying to the east at a crawl. the next day, someone on my facebook page posted a picture of it from a distance. at the time, i did not feel threatenee or scared, i was in awe. photo attached is the photo my facebook friend posted when she was driving the same night.
content.summary: Flew over my house, went to window to see what the bright lights were.

content.detailedDescription: From back deck on clear night observed 2 bright red objects treetop height about 3 finger widths apart. right one stayed stationary while left began horizontal movement away from right one. approx 5 minutes later right one began to follow same path as the other but at much higher speed. lost sight behind trees or disappeared.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 bright red objects peculiar movement low in sky on clear night

content.detailedDescription:
I was not the observer.  my father in law who was duty head of the rome air development center at griffiss afb mentioned this event to me years ago.  he was up at an af pilot radar site on the top of the mohawk valley at night running a test i think back in the early 70s and saw a ufo over the base below.  he talked to the base control the next day and there was no traffic or radar echos.  he is a trained electrical engineer who had a long and distinguished career as a civilian researcher for the air force and is now long retired.  he is 90 years old and dealing with parkinson's disease but lives in an assisted community near rome ny.   he might be open to discussing what he saw...If you email him.  he shared with me this story about 20 years ago, he mentioned it matter of factly and said he never really knew what he saw..And did not share the entire story with me as he didn't want to be thought of as a ufo nut.  his name is thomas maggio and you can check his background.  the radar site is still there operated by the faa.

again if you want to reach out to him, i can give you his email address.  i think he would welcome communication on this event.  

thanks,

mike fedele
content.summary: Unknown object above griffiss afb

content.detailedDescription: I was in in elk grove on the way to wendy's i seen this object moving strange so i took out my camera and started recording i observed it for a moment then it just disappeared into the night.
content.summary: I was on the way to wendys when i looked in the sky an seen two lights movings strangly

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brother were getting golf balls from the wildwood golf course on hole number 12 a short par three hole with a pond between the tee box and green. we had been there for close to an hour and we both noticed some type of large craft that slowly appeared from the se moving from the green towards the tee box. it made no sound and was hovering, moving very slowly towards us as we were in the water getting golf balls. at the time there was a newly constructed house just behind the green and the craft had moved directly over it as it approached us. once we seen it we hurriedly left the water and ran across number 13 fairway towards our house behind number 16 green, approximately 1/4 mile away. the craft filled the entire opening above the green making no noise and moving nothing in the trees or the ground. the craft was disc like with windows or openings, it was not spinning. i told my brother there are times that i think we possibly could have been picked up by the craft.
content.summary: Object appeared above mature pine trees and house
